title: recipes_Vermont-Style_Manhattan
text:
Title: Vermont-Style Manhattan.
.
Description: Spiced rum takes the place of bourbon here, for a flavorful switch on this classic cocktail.
.
Ingredients:.
- 2 fluid ounces spiced rum.
- 1 fluid ounce sweet vermouth.
- 1 maraschino cherry.
.
Instructions:.
- Pour rum and vermouth over ice cubes, place cherry in glass; stir, then sit back and enjoy..
.
Nutrients:.
.
Serves: 1 serving.
